text: Actress Busy Philipps is sharing her struggle with anxiety in a new video. In it, she opens up about dealing with anxiety — something that has impacted her since childhood. “ I used to lie awake in bed at night and I would have spinning thoughts. It would be really hard for me to get to sleep and I would be so scared that I wouldn ’ t go to my parents ’ room. I didn ’ t want to tell them what was happening because I thought there was something wrong with me, ” she recalls.
